sentences.sContent: Relief workers in alliance with local charities are trying to help the victims.
sentences.sCn: 救济人员与当地慈善机构联合起来，设法帮助灾民。

phrases.pCn: 战略联盟（两家公司的合作安排，两者决定分享资源，互补长短）；策略联盟
星空联盟（全球最大的航空联盟）

remMethod.val: 来自ally(v. 联合， 联盟)

trans.tranOther: an arrangement in which two or more countries, groups etc agree to work together to try to change or achieve something
